title: Is there any scope for a freelance blockchain developer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely the future in block chain is endless. Already a lot of countries have even introduced blockchain for students to have degrees. In not far future there would be a rise in blockchain developers. Every company would be looking for people who can upgrade their company. Talent and skills will play a huge role. If you are looking the scope in this industry start your learning from the moment.

Yes. no doubt here. The industry is moving towards blockchain very fast and there are many ideas, companies who want to develop tons of things with blockchain concept but looking for talent. Target countries who already permitted by their government. You can look for any freelancer employer provider and showcase your expertise.
